author: Brad Gibson
text: One of the most useful hiking apps I've found, and completely free with no ads! Hats off.

author: Jane Kim
text: Could use a little love from the dev team to make it more user friendly, but it's simple enough to use and super helpful when you're on the move.

author: Pearl Simon
text: I travel quite a bit. Have used this app in area's I know nothing about and found awesome hikes. Love it.
